Summon Sacred Scorpion

Summon Units:#2690 Sacred Scorpion
The dark realm of Xibalba is home to many horrors. Among the more numerous are scorpions of all sizes. The largest and most ancient of the creatures are considered sacred and are summoned forth by the Chilan cave priests.
